text: yaqj~jamA#paqd-yacCandA(gg)#syAqpnOtiq yadA$grayaqNaH SvO gRuqhyatEq yatraiqva yaqj~jamadRu#Saqn tata# EqvainaqM punaqH prayu#~gktEq jaga#nmuKOq vai dviqtIya#strirAqtrO jAga#ta AgrayaqNO yacca#tuqrthE&ha#nnAgrayaqNO gRuqhyatEq sva Eqvaina#mAqyata#nE gRuhNAqtyathOq svamEqva CandO&nu# paqryAva#rtantEq rAtha#ntarOq vA ai$ndravAyaqvO rAtha#ntaraM pa~jcaqmamahaqstasmA$t pa~jcaqmE&ha# - [  ] 28
